ANGELI MINI-PRO
 
The Angeli Mini-Pro is an espresso coffee machine built for household use yet maintaining all the commercial features. A professional filter holder and brass coffee brewing group provide you with a hot and creamy espresso just like in an Italian coffee bar. Frothing milk is fast and easy with professional results due to high steam production. The Angeli Mini-Pro also has a hot water dispenser for tea.

A professional style coffee grinder is also available as an option.

   
   
TECHNICAL DATA
COFFEE MACHINE
Tank capacity 1.8 liters
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 1200W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 24x26x39
Weight (kg) 10.5
Colours available Black, white
COFFEE GRINDER
Bean hopper capacity 350 gr
Ground coffee container capacity 150 gr
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 195W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 12x22x38
Weight (kg) 5
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
